resources.string: My name is Bryson Good, \nI\'m 21 years old and have live in Seattle, Wa all my life. I\'ve played trombone for 13 years, and was in the UW Husky Marching Band for 3 years. I have a 2 year old Australian Cattle Dog named Ahsoka.
I work at Ben Bridge Jeweler, as their Website Operations and manage all content updates on the website.
